1‚Üíimport { Outlet } from '@tanstack/react-router'
     2‚Üíimport { getCookie } from '@/lib/cookies'
     3‚Üíimport { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
     4‚Üíimport { LayoutProvider } from '@/context/layout-provider'
     5‚Üíimport { SearchProvider } from '@/context/search-provider'
     6‚Üíimport { SidebarInset, SidebarProvider } from '@/components/ui/sidebar'
     7‚Üíimport { AppSidebar } from '@/components/layout/app-sidebar'
     8‚Üíimport { SkipToMain } from '@/components/skip-to-main'
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üítype AuthenticatedLayoutProps = {
    11‚Üí  children?: React.ReactNode
    12‚Üí}
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üíexport function AuthenticatedLayout({ children }: AuthenticatedLayoutProps) {
    15‚Üí  const defaultOpen = getCookie('sidebar_state') !== 'false'
    16‚Üí  return (
    17‚Üí    <SearchProvider>
    18‚Üí      <LayoutProvider>
    19‚Üí        <SidebarProvider defaultOpen={defaultOpen}>
    20‚Üí          <SkipToMain />
    21‚Üí          <AppSidebar />
    22‚Üí          <SidebarInset
    23‚Üí            className={cn(
    24‚Üí              // Set content container, so we can use container queries
    25‚Üí              '@container/content',
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí              // If layout is fixed, set the height
    28‚Üí              // to 100svh to prevent overflow
    29‚Üí              'has-[[data-layout=fixed]]:h-svh',
    30‚Üí
    31‚Üí              // If layout is fixed and sidebar is inset,
    32‚Üí              // set the height to 100svh - spacing (total margins) to prevent overflow
    33‚Üí              'peer-data-[variant=inset]:has-[[data-layout=fixed]]:h-[calc(100svh-(var(--spacing)*4))]'

1‚Üíimport { createContext, useContext, useState } from 'react'
     2‚Üíimport { getCookie, setCookie } from '@/lib/cookies'
     3‚Üí
     4‚Üíexport type Collapsible = 'offcanvas' | 'icon' | 'none'
     5‚Üíexport type Variant = 'inset' | 'sidebar' | 'floating'
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üí// Cookie constants following the pattern from sidebar.tsx
     8‚Üíconst LAYOUT_COLLAPSIBLE_COOKIE_NAME = 'layout_collapsible'
     9‚Üíconst LAYOUT_VARIANT_COOKIE_NAME = 'layout_variant'
    10‚Üíconst LAYOUT_COOKIE_MAX_AGE = 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 // 7 days
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üí// Default values
    13‚Üíconst DEFAULT_VARIANT = 'inset'
    14‚Üíconst DEFAULT_COLLAPSIBLE = 'icon'
    15‚Üí
    16‚Üítype LayoutContextType = {
    17‚Üí  resetLayout: () => void
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üí  defaultCollapsible: Collapsible
    20‚Üí  collapsible: Collapsible
    21‚Üí  setCollapsible: (collapsible: Collapsible) => void
    22‚Üí
    23‚Üí  defaultVariant: Variant
    24‚Üí  variant: Variant
    25‚Üí  setVariant: (variant: Variant) => void
    26‚Üí}
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üíconst LayoutContext = createContext<LayoutContextType | null>(null)
    29‚Üí
    30‚Üítype LayoutProviderProps = {
    31‚Üí  children: React.ReactNode
    32‚Üí}
    33‚Üí
    34‚Üíexport function LayoutProvider({ children }: LayoutProviderProps) {
    35‚Üí  const [collapsible, _setCollapsible] = useState<Collapsible>(() => {
    36‚Üí    const saved = getCookie(LAYOUT_COLLAPSIBLE_COOKIE_NAME)
    37‚Üí    return (saved as Collapsible) || DEFAULT_COLLAPSIBLE
    38‚Üí  })
    39‚Üí
    40‚Üí  const [variant, _setVariant] = useState<Variant>(() => {
    41‚Üí    const saved = getCookie(LAYOUT_VARIANT_COOKIE_NAME)
    42‚Üí    return (saved as Variant) || DEFAULT_VARIANT
    43‚Üí  })
    44‚Üí
    45‚Üí  const setCollapsible = (newCollapsible: Collapsible) => {
    46‚Üí    _setCollapsible(newCollapsible)
    47‚Üí    setCookie(
    48‚Üí      LAYOUT_COLLAPSIBLE_COOKIE_NAME,
    49‚Üí      newCollapsible,
    50‚Üí      LAYOUT_COOKIE_MAX_AGE
    51‚Üí    )
    52‚Üí  }
    53‚Üí
    54‚Üí  const setVariant = (newVariant: Variant) => {
    55‚Üí    _setVariant(newVariant)
    56‚Üí    setCookie(LAYOUT_VARIANT_COOKIE_NAME, newVariant, LAYOUT_COOKIE_MAX_AGE)
    57‚Üí  }
    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí  const resetLayout = () => {
    60‚Üí    setCollapsible(DEFAULT_COLLAPSIBLE)
    61‚Üí    setVariant(DEFAULT_VARIANT)
    62‚Üí  }
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí  const contextValue: LayoutContextType = {
    65‚Üí    resetLayout,
    66‚Üí    defaultCollapsible: DEFAULT_COLLAPSIBLE,
    67‚Üí    collapsible,
    68‚Üí    setCollapsible,
    69‚Üí    defaultVariant: DEFAULT_VARIANT,
    70‚Üí    variant,
    71‚Üí    setVariant,
    72‚Üí  }
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí  return <LayoutContext value={contextValue}>{children}</LayoutContext>
    75‚Üí}
    76‚Üí
    77‚Üí// Define the hook for the provider
    78‚Üí// eslint-disable-next-line react-refresh/only-export-components
    79‚Üíexport function useLayout() {
    80‚Üí  const context = useContext(LayoutContext)
    81‚Üí  if (!context) {
    82‚Üí    throw new Error('useLayout must be used within a LayoutProvider')
    83‚Üí  }
    84‚Üí  return context
    85‚Üí}
